ActJudges Act
SubjectJudith Davies ** ANNUITY ** The Hon. William H. Davies **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to JUDITH DAVIES, survivor of the Hon. William H. Davies, a Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, effective June 4, 2017.
